languages.text: "Арджента, мне кажется, этих людей захлестнуло уныние. Проповедь дщери Его могла бы вернуть их решимость".

traits.locale_text: "Арджента, мне кажется, этих людей захлестнуло уныние. Проповедь дщери Его могла бы вернуть их решимость".

languages.text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."
languages.original_text: "Арджента, мне кажется, этих людей захлестнуло уныние. Проповедь дщери Его могла бы вернуть их решимость".

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."
"Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."
"Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."
"Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女，我认为这些人已经心灰意冷。不过，如果是神皇的女儿亲自举行布道，那肯定能让这些人再次恢复决心。”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女，我认为这些人已经心灰意冷。不过，如果是神皇的女儿亲自举行布道，那肯定能让这些人再次恢复决心。”

languages.text: «Hermana Argenta, creo que el abatimiento ha hecho mella en esta gente. El sermón de una de Sus hijas podría restaurar su determinación».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

traits.locale_text: «Hermana Argenta, creo que el abatimiento ha hecho mella en esta gente. El sermón de una de Sus hijas podría restaurar su determinación».

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、ここの人々は失意に沈んでいる。彼の娘たちが決断力を取り戻せるような説教をしてやってはくれないか」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、ここの人々は失意に沈んでいる。彼の娘たちが決断力を取り戻せるような説教をしてやってはくれないか」

languages.text: « De toute évidence, ces pauvres gens sont en proie à un profond abattement, sœur Argenta. Un sermon d'une de Ses filles les aiderait sans doute à reprendre courage. »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, ces pauvres gens sont en proie à un profond abattement, sœur Argenta. Un sermon d'une de Ses filles les aiderait sans doute à reprendre courage. »

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta, ich glaube, diese Leute wurden von Mutlosigkeit ergriffen. Eine Predigt von einer Seiner Töchter könnte sie zu alter Entschlossenheit zurückführen."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta, ich glaube, diese Leute wurden von Mutlosigkeit ergriffen. Eine Predigt von einer Seiner Töchter könnte sie zu alter Entschlossenheit zurückführen."

languages.text: "Rahibe Argenta, sanıyorum ki bu insanlar umutsuzluğa kapılmış durumda. O'nun kızlarından birinin bir vaazıyla yeniden azme kavuşurlar mı dersin?"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, I believe these people have been gripped by despondency. A sermon from one of His daughters could restore to them their determination."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe Argenta, sanıyorum ki bu insanlar umutsuzluğa kapılmış durumda. O'nun kızlarından birinin bir vaazıyla yeniden azme kavuşurlar mı dersin?"
